name: Xiao
quote: I'm willing to protect you. But don't think about getting close, and stay out of my way, or all that awaits you is regret.
description: One of the 'Mighty and Illuminated Adepti' guarding Liyue, also heralded as the 'Guardian yaksha.' Despite his appearance as a young man, occasional legends about him have been documented in ancient books for thousands of years. He is especially fond of Wangshu Inn's Almond Tofu. The reason is that the dish tastes just like the 'dreams' he used to devour.
